Projetos.description: Select a card to view the study projects I've worked on

api_gerenciamento.title: MANAGEMENT API
api_gerenciamento.description: Develop a REST API to manage users, orders, and products with full CRUD functionalities and secure authentication, using a modular and scalable architecture.

api_tarefas.title: TASK LIST API
api_tarefas.description: Develop a REST API for task management, allowing full CRUD operations, searches by priority, and completion status, with a modular and scalable architecture.

api_farmacia.title: PHARMACY ITEM MANAGEMENT API
api_farmacia.description: Develop a REST API to manage pharmacy items, offering full CRUD functionalities and ensuring an organized and scalable architecture.

sistema_bancario.title: JAVA BANKING SYSTEM
sistema_bancario.description: The goal of this system is to implement a simple bank account management solution, allowing users to create accounts, log in, withdraw funds, and check their balance.

fazendaUrbanaPoc.title: URBAN FARM POC
fazendaUrbanaPoc.description: An application to manage the operations of an urban farm, allowing control of customers, suppliers, products, and sales.

apiLivros.title: BOOK & AUTHOR MANAGEMENT API
apiLivros.description: Create an API to manage books and authors, allowing operations like creation, editing, deletion, and search, focusing on efficiency and scalability.

apiFazendaUrbana.title: URBAN FARM MANAGEMENT API
apiFazendaUrbana.description: Develop an API for CRUD operations in an urban farm, including customer, employee, supplier, product, and sales management.

fazendaUrbanaWindows.title: URBAN FARM PITAYA WINDOWS FORMS
fazendaUrbanaWindows.description: Develop an application for registration and management operations in an urban farm. The system covers CRUD functionalities for customers, employees, suppliers, products, and sales.

sistemaGerenciamento.title: MULTI-THEMATIC MUSEUM MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
sistemaGerenciamento.description: Develop a ticket purchasing system for a multi-thematic museum, highlighting the life and career of the legendary player PelÃ©.

petShop.title: PET SHOP
petShop.description: A pet shop website project built with React.

landingPizzaria.title: PIZZERIA LANDING PAGE
landingPizzaria.description: A landing page project for a pizzeria.

landingAcademia.title: GYM LANDING PAGE
landingAcademia.description: A landing page project for a gym.
